title: Invesco AI and Next Gen Software ETF (NYSEARCA:IGPT) Short Interest Up 77.3% in January
description: Invesco AI and Next Gen Software ETF (NYSEARCA:IGPT – Get Free Report) was the recipient of a large growth in short interest in the month of January. title: Voice AI Startups Hear the Sound of Money as Enterprises Sign Up
description: There is money pouring into Voice AI startups right now with at least three Indian companies having raised funding in January, and several more are in talks to raise funds in the coming months, according to investors and founders. title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures sink after gold sell-off as AI doubts creep in
description: Wall Street is on edge after Friday's sharp reversal ahead of a week defined by Trump's Fed pick, jobs data and more Big Tech earnings.
